org.pac4j.saml.transport

Class SimpleRequestAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.ServletRequestWrapper
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequestWrapper
        • org.pac4j.saml.transport.SimpleRequestAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.ServletRequest

    public class SimpleRequestAdapter
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequestWrapper
    Basic RequestAdapter returning an inputStream from the input content of the WebContext.
    Since:
    1.5.0
    Author:
    Michael Remond, Misagh Moayyed
